channel.title: Vobil Inc is an InsurTech company.
channel.description: Recent content on Vobil Inc is an InsurTech company.

item.title: The Personal Finance Calendar to subscribe to on Google Calendar, Outlook and Apple Calendar
item.description: Subscribe to Vobil's exclusive 📅 Personal Finance Calendar! We present you the Personal Finance Calendar, a quarterly-updated public calendar you can subscribe to for reminders of significant financial planning events, such as tax, investment, retirement, and insurance.

item.title: 年末独家投资理财讲座：退休计划、熊市有牛
item.description: 马上订购 Vobil 📅 个人理财日历 点击报名讲座: Eventbrite 年末独家投资理财讲座：退休计划、熊市有牛！通胀居高不下，股市跌跌不休，有种方式肯定不跌，稳中有张还有不同程度的开户分红。邀请您来参加讲座，了解如何制定退休计划、聪明保税，一起抗通膨！ 解答的问题： 人的寿命更长，到底存多少钱才够花？ 税收对未来退休有多大影响？如何去优化？ 熊市中如何安稳退休？还可以做高风险投资吗？ 讲座内容： 如何计算退休的花费

item.title: Step-by-step Guide on Roth 401K Conversion Before Year End (2022 Edition for Vanguard, Fidelity and Principal)
item.description: Subscribe to Vobil's exclusive 📅 Personal Finance Calendar! Hi there, welcome to Vobil Inc's blog series on how your financial security!

item.title: Seminar - Enhance Your Financial Security When Facing Job Insecurity
item.description: Subscribe to Vobil's exclusive 📅 Personal Finance Calendar! Click to get your ticket: Eventbrite About Event Did you go through job changes recently?

item.title: Terms & Conditions
item.description: 1. Definitions We collect certain identifying personal data when you sign up to our Service such as your name, email address, PayPal address (if different from email address), and telephone number.
